page.title: 09A WEEKEND IN JULY
page.content: ON SATURDAY I WENT TO MY FRIENDS HOUSE AND WE SAT IN THE GARDEN AND SUNBATHED FOR A WHILE.IN THE EVENING MY FAMILY WENT TO THE{SHELL CLUB.}ON SUNDAY I WENT TO THE{STABLES}ALL DAY. AT THE{STABLES}I MUCKED OUT,D1D THE WATER ,SWEPT THE YARD AND LED THE HORSES.WHEN I GOT HOME I WASHED THE DOG AND THEN HAD A SHOWER.AFTER I HAD MY ROAST DINNER WE ALL SAT DOWN AND WATCHED{TELEVISION.} ON SATURDAY MY MUM JUST SAT IN FRONT OF THE{TELEVISION}AND WATCHED BORIS BECKER PLAY TENNIS AT WIMBLEDON.IN THE EVENING I WENT WITH MY MUM AND DAD TO THE{SHELL CLUB.}MY DAD WENT TO WORK AT SHELL HAVEN OIL REFINERY.I WENT AND PLAYED{BADMINTON}FOR THE REST OF THE DAY.ON SUNDAY MY MUM AND I WENT SWIMMING AT THE{SHELL CLUB}WHILST MY DAD WORKED AT SHELL OIL REFINERY.
